parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
The direction of the internet traffic.

Valid values:

*   **in**: inbound traffic
*   **out**: outbound traffic

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content in the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The IP address of the access source.

parameters.name: SrcPrivateIP
parameters.description: The private IP address of the source.

parameters.name: SrcPublicIP
parameters.description: The public IP address of the source.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: TrafficType
parameters.description:
The type of the traffic that is captured. Valid values:

*   **max** (default): peak traffic
*   **avg**: average traffic
